price: (Fir‘aon) wí pé: “Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, dájúdájú nígbà náà ẹ máa wà nínú àwọn alásùn-únmọ́ (mi).”
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
